dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Moelants, T. 2010. Distichodus decemmaculatus. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Distichodus decemmaculatus is known from the Central Congo River basin. Recently, it has been found in Pool Malebo (Stanley Pool) (pers. obs. Victorine Mbadu).
